title: Malaika Arora And Jacqueline Fernandez Are A Lesson In Airport Beauty, With Almost Zero Effort
text:
facebook 674 SHARES When you’re busy packing and coordinating schedules, it’s hard to conjure an airport look that allows you to be comfortable, doesn’t smudge when you doze off in the plane, yet looks polished and fresh. Enter: Malaika Arora and Jacqueline Fernandez’s simple airport beauty hacks. 
To get their easy yet practical hair looks, go for a high ponytail. This naturally lifts your face and draws attention to your features, while also keeping any annoying strands at bay. Spritz a face mist to hydrate your skin, and add a super hydrating moisturiser to give it that dewy glow. 
Now that your skin is armed to combat dry airplane air, moisturise your lips well, with a lip product that doesn’t leave a residue. Like Jacqueline and Malaika, get that fresh pout by going for a lip stain that is bright yet natural. Stains seep into the skin instead of sitting on the surface like lipstick, and are great for when you need a lip look that says “my lips, but better.” 
As for the eyes, just go makeup-free and hide any bags or circles behind your largest sunnies, and save yourself from a raccoon-eye situation (thanks, mascara) when you wake up on the other side of the world. Genius, right?
